coneInnerAngle.description: The angular diameter of a cone inside of which there will be no angular volume reduction.

coneOuterAngle.description: A parameter for directional audio sources that is an angle, in degrees, outside of which the volume will be reduced to a constant value of coneOuterGain.

coneOuterGain.description: A parameter for directional audio sources that is the gain outside of the cone outer angle.
